page.title: 15South Wootton Village hall
page.content: The Village hall beongs to the South Wootton Community association and was built in 1980,after five years of fund raising. The hall is run by the management committee, which is elected annually.There are ten members of the committee,which includes four officers,three residents and three from community clubs. The land on which it stands is leased from the Parish council for Â£1 per year and the car park belongs to the parish council.Funds are raised for its upkeep by an annual fete and barn dance at Christmas.Residents are charged 25%less for the use of the hall. Groups who meet at the hall are- W.I.,Art & Craft club,Bridge clubs,Dancing(modern,once a month)dancing(children,weekly), playgroup(daily)child clinic,once a month plus weddings and discos.
